summary.span: 表示控制項，該控制項提供具有滑動 的捲軸，其位置會與某個值對應。

span.span: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding whose position corresponds to a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示控制項。The following illustration shows a control. ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "捲軸圖例")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") 控制項包含控制項。The control contains a control. 控制項組成控制項及兩個控制項。The control consists of a control and two controls. 您可以增加和減少屬性藉由按下控制項控制項，或藉由移動。You can increase and decrease the property of the control by pressing the controls or by moving the . 預設範圍的值屬性是從 0 到 1。The default range of values for the property is from 0 to 1. 代表線性距離的端點之間。The represents the linear distance of the between the endpoints of the . 您可以變更預設值的範圍，藉由設定和屬性。You can change the default range of values by setting the and properties. 屬性會決定是否會顯示水平或垂直方向，而且您必須定義要針對此屬性的控制項出現。The property determines whether the is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the control to appear. 中為導向，讓值增加由上至下下方的垂直或從左到右的水平。The in a is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical or from left to right for a horizontal . 下表中的屬性是對應的繫結目標屬性時屬性未明確定義。The properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding properties when the property is not explicitly defined. 如果您明確地定義屬性，繫結不存在。If you explicitly define the property, the binding does not occur. | 屬性 property| 屬性 property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 您可以存取控制控制項使用屬性。You can access the control of a control by using the property. 若要顯示有捲軸的內容方塊內，使用控制項。To display content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the control. ## 自訂捲軸控制項Customizing the ScrollBar Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[捲軸樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立在水平具有值 0 和 100 之間的範圍。The following example shows how to create a horizontal that has a range of values between 0 and 100. [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#ScrollBar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#scrollbar)]

span.span: The command that notifies the that the user is dragging the of the horizontal to the value that is provided in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者拖曳的軸之捲動方塊、呼叫如。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果傳回`true`、執行該命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果傳回`false`、執行。If returns `false`, the executes the . 啟用延後捲動功能會使用此命令。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 當是`true`和使用者拖曳的、 內容的並不會變更，直到使用者放開。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果啟用延後捲動，執行的水平當使用者拖曳。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a horizontal when the user drags the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者拖曳的軸之捲動方塊、呼叫如。When the user drags the thumb of a , the calls for the . 如果傳回`true`、執行該命令。If returns `true`, the executes that command. 如果傳回`false`、執行。If returns `false`, the executes the . 啟用延後捲動功能會使用此命令。The uses this command to enable deferred scrolling. 當是`true`和使用者拖曳的、 內容的並不會變更，直到使用者放開。When is `true` and a user drags the of the , the content of the does not change until the user releases the . 如果啟用延後捲動，執行的垂直當使用者拖曳。If deferred scrolling is enabled, the executes the for a vertical when the user drags the .

summary.span: 這個事件在使用者使用滑鼠移動 以在 中捲動內容時會發生，次數為一次或多次。

span.span: Occurs one or more times as content scrolls in a when the user moves the by using the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件通常就會發生多次當使用者變更的拖曳。This event typically occurs multiple times when the user changes the of the by dragging the . 要做為會引發這個事件的次數沒有限制拖曳位置。There is no limit to the number of times this event is raised as the position is dragged. 此事件就不會引發的時機的控制項變更程式碼中。This event is not raised when the of the control is changed in code. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何指派的事件處理常式事件控制項，以及如何在程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。The following example shows how assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler in code. [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#Scroll](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#scroll)] [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#ScrollHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#scrollhandler)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#ScrollHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#scrollhandler)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項的 。

span.span: Gets the for a control.

value.span: 與 控制項搭配使用的 。

span.span: The that is used with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般樣式範本控制項包含前後任一邊上由兩個控制項控制項。A typical style template for a control includes a control that is surrounded on either side by two controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何存取搭配使用的控制項控制項。The following example shows how to access the control that is used with a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#track)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Track](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#track)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ViewportSize { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ViewportSize : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前可以看到的可捲動內容量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.

value.span: 目前可見之可捲動的內容量。

span.span: The amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所使用的單位是相同的單位，用來描述內容的長度。The units that are used for are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content. 一些範例包括文字行或頁面的文字。Some examples include lines of text or pages of text. 值屬性用來計算的大小控制項顯示為 中滑動的值指標控制項。The value of the property is used to calculate the size of the control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a control. 控制項的大小代表數量顯示的控制項的內容。The control's size represents the amount of a control's content that is visible. 如果 25%的控制項的內容就會顯示佔用中追蹤的 25% 。If 25 percent of a control's content is visible, the occupies 25 percent of the track in the . 您可以決定哪些單位使用。You can decide which units uses. 當您設定這個屬性時，請確定， ， ，和屬性，請使用相同的單位。When you set this property, make sure that the , , , and properties use the same units. 下圖顯示如何大小會反映的內容是可見的量。The following illustration shows how the size reflects the amount of content that is visible. ![滑桿長度和縮圖大小的捲軸](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "滑桿長度和縮圖大小的捲軸")![The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定上控制項。The following example shows how to set the on a control. [!code-csharp[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#viewport)] [!code-vb[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#viewport)] [!code-xaml[ScrollBarSnips#Viewport](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ScrollBarSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#viewport)]
